titleStmt.title: Writing tables vvith a kalender for xxiiii. yeeres, with sundry necessarye rules.
titleStmt.author: Adams, Frank, fl. 1559-1601.

publicationStmt.publisher: By [R. Watkins and J. Roberts for] Frauncis Adams, stationer or bookbinder, dwelling in Distaffe lane, neare olde fishstreete, at the signe of the Aqua vite still, and are there to be sold,

notesStmt.note: Identified as STC 102 on UMI microfilm reel 450.
Reproductions of the original in Cambridge University Library.
Appears at reels 450 and 1760 (same copy filmed twice).
Mutilated. Reel 450: only quire A filmed. Reel 1760: lacking C7; creased, faded, stained, tightly bound and torn, with some loss of print.

place.placeName: Distaffe lane, neare olde fishstreete, at the signe of the Aqua vite still
